data.price: 74. Waa kuwa yidhaahda: Rabbigayow! Naga sii xaasaskayaga iyo ubadkayaga waxay indhaheenna ku farxaan28, noogana yeel kuwa Alle ka cabsada Iimaam (ay ku daydaan).
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡوَٰجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُنٖ وَٱجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
data.footnotes: 28. Macnaha waa aan ku faraxno oo il qabowsanno sababta toosnidooda darteed iyo Alle ka cabsigooda.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yaqūlūna rabbanā hab lanā min azwājinā wadhurriyyātinā qurrata aʿyunin wa-ij'ʿalnā lil'muttaqīna imāman

dua.name: Dua for Spiritual Insight
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance to become a source of spiritual inspiration and wisdom for others, emphasizing inner illumination.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
